TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Manipulation extends System.Object
public ref class Manipulation abstract sealed

summary.span: 包含用于获取和更新有关操作的信息的方法。

span.span: Contains methods to get and update information about a manipulation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当触摸被解释为应用于对象的实际操作时，将发生一次操作。A manipulation occurs when touch is interpreted as a physical action that is applied to an object. 在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 中，操作事件将输入解释为转换、扩展或旋转操作。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], manipulation events interpret input as a translation, expansion, or rotation manipulation. 通常与通过定义的操作事件的操作进行交互。You usually interact with manipulations through the manipulation events that are defined on the . 但是，类定义可以使用与操作进行交互的静态方法。However, the class defines static methods that you can use to interact with manipulations. 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 操作响应的应用程序的示例，请参阅[演练： 创建应用的第一个触摸程序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public static void AddManipulator (System.Windows.UIElement element, System.Windows.Input.IManipulator manipulator);

param.name: element
param.span: 与该操控器关联的元素。

span.span: The element to associate the manipulator with.

param.name: manipulator
param.span: 提供输入位置的对象，该输入创建操作或被添加到操作中。

span.span: The object that provides the position of the input that creates or is added to a manipulation.

summary.span: 将 对象与指定的元素关联。

span.span: Associates a object with the specified element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`element`已具有与其关联操作`manipulator`添加到现有的操作。If `element` already has a manipulation associated with it, `manipulator` is added to the existing manipulation. 否则，创建新的操作。Otherwise, a new manipulation is created.

span.span: is .
-or-
is .
The property on element is .

summary.span: 调用时，将不再跟踪操作输入，并且指定元素的惯性将停止。

span.span: When called, manipulation input is no longer tracked and inertia on the specified element stops.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当调用方法时，引发事件。When the method is called, the event is raised.
